content: Dont know if this has been posted elsewhere, but here goes: The link listed below is to a VFW article about a proposed change to who pays for service-connected injuries. Right now, Uncle Sam is responsible for that. If Obabma has his way, we will be. Basically what he wants to do is to force your civilian insurance to pay for your service connected injuries- that is if you have insurance. Good luck getting a job if you have service connected disabilities. Employers probably wont hire you cuz now their insurance premiums will go through the roof. It is bad enough that we have to put up with the ridiculous care from the military/gov't- now to add insult to injury they want us to pay for it? Read the article: http://www.vfw.org/index.cfm?fa=news.newsDtl&did=4961 Is it just me or is Obama out of his mind? Chains you can believe in.

title: Obama wants Service Members to pay for their injuries

content: Let me just say that the Vets deserve all medical paid for the rest of their life. I would also like to say the all the money that AIG is getting should be yours. I have no problem taking care of our service men and women.
reply: Let me just say that the Vets deserve all medical paid for the rest of their life. I would also like to say the all the money that AIG is getting should be yours. I have no problem taking care of our service men and women.
title: Obama wants Service Members to pay for their injuries

content: I can't believe that anyone,(let alone the Commander-in-Chief) could suggest anything as irresponsible and absurd, as to suggest that service members injured while on active duty be responsible for paying for their own medical needs. It is bad enough that for years we paid our own disablility out of retirement, (and some still do). Let's not make another gross error in judgement and common-sense. If this is true and somehow becomes law, we will never get anyone to enlist in any branch of our military. Then who will protect our rights and freedoms? Will it be the NEVER-SERVED elected leaders?I doubt it! How much longer will we be the "home of the free"? Because at this rate we will not be the "home of the brave"! Are we going to hire mercenaries to protect our beliefs, ideals, rights, and freedoms? The feudal kings found this would not work. WAKE-UP JDP RLTW

content: Yeah, I mean it didn't bother me I just never knew why. I might have done something wrong and if I did I apologize for any mistake I made, no worries... The story is one to take notice of. What's next? Revamping the VA system to make vets suffer for their service? It is scary to think of what this man really has in his plans for the majority of brave people this country has? At a time when I feel that Service members deserve a he11 of a lot more then they get now he might just make them a suffer even more. Seriously, I smell a big former-troop movement coming down the pike. Destination - 1600 Pennsylvania avenue. Did I not say before his administration would parallel the Hoover Administration? Quantum materiae materietur marmota monax si marmota monax materiam possit materiari?

content: D_mn, he is going to make me out a liar. I put about 100 folks a year into ADAF for 4 years. Double that for 3 in ANG recruiting. Never thought the CIC would make me regret that. This is going to be worse than Carter and Clinton combined. Remember those folks that were going to 'teach the Republican party a lesson and not vote'? This is the reaction from your inaction.

content: One more thing, I caught this on another commentary. Worth repeating: I have read all of the posted comments and agree with the sentiments expressed, however, I am very surprised that so few saw this coming. Tigers do not change their stripes and neither does the radical left of the Marxist-Leninist. Obama's history is replete with anti-military rhetoric. You can put this in the same column as HR45 which is the first step in confiscation of firearms from all U.S. citizens (except the criminals) which virtually copies directly the edicts issued by Lenin after the 1917 Bolshevik Revolution in Russia leading to the total confiscation of all privately owned firearms and under Stalin mass arrests, imprisonment, and execution for the crime against the state in having once owned a firearm. If this bill is news to you please look it up. Thomas Jefferson was right on concerning private ownership of firearms, " With the right to private ownership of firearms you are a citizen, and without the right to private ownership of firearms you are a subject" and "This (the 2nd Amendment) is not intended to protect the citizenry from foreign invaders, it is to protect the citizenry from its government" Go back to Obama's campaign speechs in which he stated clearly what he planned to do to the US Military forces i.e. unilateral nuclear disarmament, stop development of all strategic and conventional weapons, slash the military funding by up to 50% within his "first" term, standdown and decommission our "Boomers" and land based missiles, cut back the "unnecessary entitlement" programs supporting military retirees and eventually delete them. The list goes on and on and most people must not have listened to him. His "plan" in Afghanistan is to break the military, our military. I was there before it became a popular tour area, in fact when the real bad guys were there. It broke the Soviet forces and it will break ours. It is an unwinnable conventional war and Obama knows it. We proved an organized guerilla force can defeat conventional forces at will. The only method of warfare that will produce a "victory" in Afghanistan (which has absolutely no strategic value to us whereas it did for the Soviets who wanted a warm water port)is a sustained ruthless campaign by small hunter killer units operating without restrictions of any kind. We have the special forces and the expertise but do not have the conviction to do what needs to be done. Obama plans to break our force structure, demoralize the troops, kill recruitment for the US All Volunteer "Mercenary" Army on the cheap, and undermine the "real leadership" field grade officer corps and middle and senior NCO corps. The General Officers have sold out already, fortunately for us Obama thinks they are the military leaders (obviously something he was taught by Putin's boys). As questioned in one comment "What is next? Our pensions? The answer is an emphatic yes! Obama is on record saying that "the military retiremet system is an entitlement program that "we" cannot afford." A lot of people think this an endurance contest and it will be over in four years, but as one of our real patriots said, "what makes you think there will be an election in 2012?" For This, Our Country, the United States, To "Remain The Land Of The Free, And The Home of The Brave," The Brave Need To Be Ready Because The Call To Defend Our Nation Against Its Enemies, Both Foreign and Domestic, Takes On A Whole New And Most Desperate Meaning!
